loonR 0.2.55
  • Reference

    Plot venn diagram by ggvenn

    Source: R/Common.R
    plotVenn.Rd

    Plot venn diagram by ggvenn

    plotVenn(
  l.list,
  alpha = 0.5,
  palette = "aaas",
  show_elements = FALSE,
  show_percentage = TRUE,
  text_size = 4,
  set_name_size = 6,
  title = NULL
)

    Arguments

    l.list

    a list as input data

    alpha

    Default 0.5

    palette

    Default aaas

    show_elements

    Show set elements instead of count/percentage.

    show_percentage

    Show percentage for each set.

    text_size

    Default 4, Text size for intersect contents.

    set_name_size

    Default 6, Text color for set names.

    title

    Value

    The ggplot object to print or save to file.

    Examples

    plotVenn(l.list)
#> Loading required package: ggvenn
#> Error in is.data.frame(data): object 'l.list' not found
l.list = list(`Up in early HCC` = early.up.genes,
`Down in early HCC` = early.down.genes,
`Up in advanced HCC` = advanced.up.genes,
`Down in advanced HCC` = advanced.down.genes)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'early.up.genes' not found
plotVenn(l.list)
#> Error in is.data.frame(data): object 'l.list' not found
